English: the mass line, CPC term for Party policy aimed at broadening and cultivating contacts with the masses

d.f: `一~`種~`政治~`手段~。`為~`爭取~`個人~`或~`團體~`的~`利益~，`假手~`於~`群眾~，`藉~`群眾~`的~`力量~`以~`達成~`目的~。

English: the mass line, CPC term for Party policy aimed at broadening and cultivating contacts with the masses
